meaningMnemonic: The <radical>husband</radical> radical and the <kanji>husband</kanji> kanji are the same. How useful, unlike some husbands, I'd imagine.
readingMnemonic: What do all <kanji>husband</kanji>s love? <reading>Foo</reading>d (ふう)! Can you hear your future husband? He’s saying, "Fooooood! FOOOOOD!” like some kind of food craving zombie.
